messages.title: A SUCCESSFUL BREXIT FOR NEWCASTLE
messages.content: Working for the Prime Minister's plan for Brexit to deliver jobs and security.

messages.title: A LOCAL CHAMPION FOR NEWCASTLE
messages.content: Owen has experience in helping to turn around struggling organizations and he believes in investing in the local area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports the Prime Minister's plan for Brexit to deliver jobs and security, to get the best possible deal for Britain and Newcastle.
Focusing on support for local businesses to trade freely with our neighbours in Europe.

issues.brexitEurope: Owen Meredith supported the referendum and trusts the Prime Minister to deliver what we voted for.
issues.economy: Support for local businesses to trade freely with our neighbours in Europe.

endorsements.endorser: Rt. Hon THERESA MAY Prime Minister
endorsements.endorsement: Owen is a strong local campaigner who will be a great champion for Newcastle-under-Lyme. With him, you will have a strong voice in Parliament.

quotes.text: Theresa May: strong, stable leadership in the national interest.

images.caption: Campaign images, including the Prime Minister, Theresa May, and identifiable branding of the Conservative Party.
